about_the_game:
WELCOME TO UNDERCURRENT INDUSTRIES!

An independent marine biology unit that specializes in underwater preservation. A new super mineral found deep underwater has companies, countries and pirates fighting for every piece in unchartered waters, leaving behind a trail of destruction!

We need you and your team to sneak into the deep and safely extract the minerals to create disinterest in the area, and save the ecosystem from extinction.
There's no manual for how to do this, but we've given your team plenty of equipment to get creative. I'm sure you'll figure something out!

1-4 PLAYER PvE

Work together as a team to dive, explore and maintain a covert operation through massive underwater worlds filled with bustling biomes, hostile environments, and hidden rewards. You will need to rely on your teammates if you want to survive the deep and unpredictable oceans!

4 UNIQUE CLASSES

Pick the right class for the job. Keep your team aware of their surroundings with the Navigator, scout ahead and find the right path as the Scout, utilize the power of marine biology as the Researcher, or cause distractions and chaos with alternative means as the Saboteur.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED OCEANS

Explore underwater ecosystems filled with a variety of hostiles to overcome and hidden bounties to collect. There's always something new to discover and no two playthroughs are alike.

HIGH-TECH GADGETS AND EQUIPMENT

Use well-known marine biology equipment such as Remote Cameras, Seafloor Mapping, Sample Kits, and Sound Sensors to find clues and gather as much contamination evidence as you can. Choose from a variety of equipment such as the Marine Radio, Scavenger Hook, Sonar, and Laser Scanner to help your team escape a dangerous situation.

EVENTS

Identify different environmental threats, each with unique missions and dangerous encounters that are distinctive to your underwater environments. Record evidence and publish results to a News or Research team for a big payout. There are also weekly challenges if your team feels up to the task.

STORY

Find stray radio waves and piece together audio logs that reveal mysteries lost deep underwater.

GOOD LUCK AND STAY HIDDEN!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Minimum Specs are for VR, lower specs may work for Non-VR.

short_description: 1-4 player PvE submarine roguelite. A new super mineral has been found deep underwater! Team up with Marine Biologists in tech-filled submarines, stealthily explore vast procedurally-generated oceans, defend endangered species, and sustainably extract the minerals for upgrades to dive deeper..
